thread.title: Justine Kristensen, London
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Justine Kristensen, London

author: Justine Kristensen, London
title: Justine Kristensen, London
text:
I first found this shop whilst visiting my son at Uni in Newcastle. When I asked for advice in store the guys couldn't have been more helpful and unlike other climbing shops, these guys had actually climbed mountains. Since returning home I have ordered four times via the website and each order has been received very quickly (within a couple of days) and the order correct. The range of items available is mind boggling and the quality top notch. Despite living in London this is my go to shop for all my hiking and climbing needs.
I can't recommend this shop or the staff highly enough.
